title: 我哦想知道 1.66里没有小型地图？？
author: happyha05
txt_content:
我哦想知道 1.66里没有小型地图？？
  怎么样才有啊

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
1. 可以做地图
[paper][paper][paper]
[paper][compass][paper]
[paper][paper][paper]

2. 论坛搜索一下 zanminimap

replies.author: qtr2000
replies.txt_content: 加MOD  查一下小地图  mod  论坛有

replies.author: hyl12344321
replies.txt_content: 用本身的地图其实挺好

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
1.6.6有小地圖, 要安裝MOD才能用

搬運帖 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-5346-1-1.html
找 [1.6.6] ZanMinimap 0.10.0 下載
安裝方法, 只要把壓縮檔內所有文件放入 minecraft.jar ,並刪除其中的 META-INF 文件夾即可.

replies.author: happyha05
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-6-25 10:49 
1. 可以做地图
噢噢，Thanks
